abstract: Pete Wells reviews New Nordic restaurant Aska in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

headline.print_headline: A Nordic Chef’s Vision Bears Fruit (and Lichens)
headline.main: At Aska, a Nordic Chef’s Vision Bears Fruit (and Lichens)

snippet: For Fredrik Berselius, a third Brooklyn restaurant proves to be the charm, with a tasting menu of startling combinations....
lead_paragraph: For Fredrik Berselius, a third Brooklyn restaurant proves to be the charm, with a tasting menu of startling combinations.
